entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 18 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Local blowing snow. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
